author: dannyc
msg: editorial change: removed the thread-safe clause in the first phrase of the second para. The javadoc is already clear in the 1st para about exactly what the guarantee to the developer is for STM and is a good precis of the spec language. People have been confused by the word 'thread-safe' thinking is guarantees them more than it does.
